participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subj_resp_nic_q01.Description: Please rate the extent to which these words describe your feelings the very first time you smoked a cigarette. The number 1 indicates none, and 4 represents intense. While smoking your very first cigarette, did you have pleasurable sensations (did you feel a pleasurable buzz or rush; relaxed, dizzy)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4

subj_resp_nic_q02.Description: Please rate the extent to which these words describe your feelings the very first time you smoked a cigarette. The number 1 indicates none, and 4 represents intense. While smoking your very first cigarette, did you have unpleasant sensations (did you feel nausea, did you cough)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4

subj_resp_nic_q03.Description: Were you alone the first time you experimented with cigarettes? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No

subj_resp_nic_q04.Description: Please rate the extent to which these words describe your feelings the very first time you used an e-cigarette or e-hookah. The number 1 indicates none, and 4 represents intense. While using your very first e-cigarette or e-hookah, did you have pleasurable sensations (did you feel a pleasurable buzz or rush, relaxed, dizzy)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4

subj_resp_nic_q05.Description: Please rate the extent to which these words describe your feelings the very first time you used an e-cigarette or e-hookah. The number 1 indicates none, and 4 represents intense. While using your very first e-cigarette or e-hookah, did you have unpleasant sensations (did you feel nausea, did you cough)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4

subj_resp_nic_q06.Description: Were you alone the first time you experimented with an e-cigarette or e-hookah? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No

subj_resp_nic_q07.Description: Please rate the extent to which these words describe your feelings the very first time you used smokeless tobacco such as snus or chew. The number 1 indicates none, and 4 represents intense. While using your very first smokeless tobacco such as snus or chew, did you have pleasurable sensations (did you feel a pleasurable buzz or rush, relaxed, dizzy)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4

subj_resp_nic_q08.Description: Please rate the extent to which these words describe your feelings the very first time you used smokeless tobacco such as snus or chew. The number 1 indicates none, and 4 represents intense. While using your very first smokeless tobacco such as snus or chew, did you have unpleasant sensations (did you feel nausea, did you cough)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4

subj_resp_nic_q09.Description: Were you alone the first time you experimented with smokeless tobacco such as snus or chew? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No

res_tobacco_q01_l.Description: While smoking your very first cigarette, did you have pleasurable sensations (did you feel a pleasurable buzz or rush; relaxed, dizzy)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4 / tlfb_cig_use_l  == '1' &&  tlfb_cig_use_c_l   == 0

res_tobacco_q02_l.Description: While smoking your very first cigarette, did you have unpleasant sensations (did you feel nausea, did you cough)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4 / tlfb_cig_use_l  == '1' &&  tlfb_cig_use_c_l   == 0

res_tobacco_q08_l.Description: Were you alone the first time you experimented with cigarettes? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No / tlfb_cig_use_l  == '1' &&  tlfb_cig_use_c_l   == 0

res_tobacco_q09_l.Description: While using your very first e-cigarette or e-hookah, did you have pleasurable sensations (did you feel a pleasurable buzz or rush, relaxed, dizzy)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4 / tlfb_ecig_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_hookah_use_l  == '1'  &&  tlfb_ecig_use_c_l  == '0' &&  tlfb_hookah_use_c_l  == '0'

res_tobacco_q10_l.Description: While using your very first e-cigarette or e-hookah, did you have unpleasant sensations (did you feel nausea, did you cough)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4 / tlfb_ecig_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_hookah_use_l  == '1'  &&  tlfb_ecig_use_c_l  == '0' &&  tlfb_hookah_use_c_l  == '0'

res_tobacco_q16_l.Description: Were you alone the first time you experimented with an e-cigarette or e-hookah? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No / tlfb_ecig_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_hookah_use_l  == '1'  &&  tlfb_ecig_use_c_l  == '0' &&  tlfb_hookah_use_c_l  == '0'

res_tobacco_q17_l.Description: While using your very first smokeless tobacco such as snus or chew, did you have pleasurable sensations (did you feel a pleasurable buzz or rush, relaxed, dizzy)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4 / tlfb_chew_use_l  == '1' &&  tlfb_chew_use_c_l  == '0'

res_tobacco_q18_l.Description: While using your very first smokeless tobacco such as snus or chew, did you have unpleasant sensations (did you feel nausea, did you cough)? | 1 = None1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = Intense4 / tlfb_chew_use_l  == '1' &&  tlfb_chew_use_c_l  == '0'

res_tobacco_q24_l.Description: Were you alone the first time you experimented with smokeless tobacco such as snus or chew? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No / tlfb_chew_use_l  == '1' &&  tlfb_chew_use_c_l  == '0'

su_nic_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self_Administered ; 3=Combination [sched_delay] = '7'

res_tobacco_total_cig.Description: Total intensity of positive and negative effects of first cigarette use | sum(res_tobacco_q01_b4ef79, res_tobacco_q02_fcbb01)

res_tobacco_total_cig_i.Description: Total intensity of positive and negative effects of first cigarette use | sum(res_tobacco_q01_l, res_tobacco_q02_l)

res_tobacco_total_ecig.Description: Total intensity of positive and negative effects of first ENDs and/or hookah use | sum(res_tobacco_q09_f99ddd, res_tobacco_q10_5e216c)

res_tobacco_total_ecig_i.Description: Total intensity of positive and negative effects of first ENDs and/or hookah use | sum(res_tobacco_q09_l, res_tobacco_q10_l)

res_tobacco_total_chew.Description: Total intensity of positive and negative effects of first smokeless tobacco or chew use | sum(res_tobacco_q17_d5609f, res_tobacco_q18_5e32d4)

res_tobacco_total_chew_i.Description: Total intensity of positive and negative effects of first smokeless tobacco or chew use | sum(res_tobacco_q17_l, res_tobacco_q18_l)
